title: 9News Adelaide | Thursday November 6 | Full Episode
description: Brenton Ragless and Kate Collins lead the Adelaide news, with police launching a massive fresh search near Mount Gambier in the cold case of Margaret Bernie, who vanished nearly four decades ago. We have a live report from the scene and a look at the history of the case. Also in the news, an Adelaide coach faces justice after admitting to child sex crimes, a major deal brings China Eastern flights direct to Adelaide, and a safety update on the algal bloom crisis on South Australian beaches.
